name: Cyber-Blade 3077
description:
Made for Nanyang Poly Studio Project 2

I (Jun Le) mainly worked on the programming but did do some of the art assets.

If some of the sprite looks bad then its probably mine xD. (The sprites are only in lvl 1)

Unfortunately not all mechanics (shop) was able to be done in time :/

At the menu, input in the konami code to unlock all upgrades. (Recommended to do so)

Controls:

WASD to move
Left click to shoot
Mouse to Aim
Right click to dash - your invunerable while dashing
Space to slow down time - your not affected but everything else is
R to reflect - can reflect enemy bullets too if upgrade is unlocked
F to interact with objects (if you can move pass something nor shoot it, you have to interact with it first)

Driving Level Controls:
Same as before but you can hover over enemies with your mouse to lock on to them.
Right click to shoot homing rockets towards targets.

If some of the controls don't work, it is highly likely due to the upgrade not being unlocked.

Thus, at the main menu input in the Konami Code.

Additional details and guide in the readme.txt provided

You die in one hit, good luck ^^
